Classes in com.myronmarston.music.scales used by com.myronmarston.music
Scale
          Scales are used to convert a Note to a MidiNote and to provide the midi file with a time signature.

MajorScale
          The most common scale used in western music.
MinorScale
          A natural minor scale: WHWWHWW.

Tonality
          Enumerates the two main tonalities: Major and Minor.
